articles.author: Luke Barr
articles.title: China's hackers are preparing to 'wreak havoc' and 'cause real world harm' to Americans: FBI Director - ABC News
articles.description: The FBI director made the remarks in prepared testimony.
articles.content:
China's hackers are preparing to "wreak havoc" and "cause real-world harm" to Americans, FBI Director Christopher Wray will warn in congressional testimony submitted on Wednesday.

articles.title: Humans are going back to the moon to stay, but when that will be is becoming less clear - Phys.org
